item.title: If You Thought the DOJ’s Anti-Trump Lawfare Was Over, Think Again
item.description: This is an outrageous maneuver by a federal prosecutor.

item.title: Congestion Pricing Could Be Good, but Not Like This
item.description: If New York really wants to improve its transportation, it should privatize the subway.

item.title: At Long Last, Justin Trudeau’s Time Is Ending
item.description: Under his watch, Canada has made tax-and-spend fiscal policy a national tradition on par with maple syrup.

item.title: How the DOGE Could Succeed
item.description: For it to be more than a gimmick, its champions need to resolve its purpose, its form, and its disposition toward government.
